statement.p: A coffee distributor plans to mix some Gazebo coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${10.60} per pound with some Costa Rican coffee that sells for \displaystyle\${12.10} per pound to create \displaystyle{30} pounds of a new coffee blend that will sell for \displaystyle\${10.75} per pound.
How many pounds of each kind of coffee should they mix? Round to the nearest pound. pounds of Gazebo coffee. pounds of Costa Rican coffee.
